sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>fingers</radical> are <radical>private</radical>, no one can see them unless they <kanji>pay</kanji>! And you decide if what they pay is enough to get a peek.
meaningInfo: Imagine people coming from miles around to pay for a look at your private fingers.
readingMnemonic: If someone tries to look without paying, that's <reading>hara</reading>ssment (<ja>はら</ja>)! Nobody gets to see something of yours without proper payment, but more importantly, your consent!
readingInfo: If somebody looks at your fingers without paying, without your consent, file a harassment claim on their butt! That is NOT okay!
